name: Document
description: Represents a file that a user can upload and store in Salesforce.
summary:
The `Document` object in Salesforce is a standard object that represents a document stored within the Salesforce platform. Here is a summary of its attributes:

1. **Id**: Unique identifier for the document (type: `id`).
2. **FolderId**: Reference to the folder where the document is stored (type: `reference`).
3. **IsDeleted**: Indicates whether the document is deleted (type: `boolean`).
4. **Name**: The name of the document (type: `string`).
5. **DeveloperName**: The developer name of the document (type: `string`).
6. **NamespacePrefix**: The namespace prefix of the document (type: `string`).
7. **ContentType**: The content type of the document (type: `string`).
8. **Type**: The type of the document (type: `string`).
9. **IsPublic**: Indicates whether the document is public (type: `boolean`).
10. **BodyLength**: The length of the document body (type: `int`).
11. **Body**: The document content in base64 encoding (type: `base64`).
12. **Url**: The URL of the document (type: `string`).
13. **Description**: A description of the document (type: `textarea`).
14. **Keywords**: Keywords associated with the document (type: `string`).
15. **IsInternalUseOnly**: Indicates whether the document is for internal use only (type: `boolean`).
16. **AuthorId**: Reference to the author of the document (type: `reference`).
17. **CreatedDate**: The date and time when the document was created (type: `datetime`).
18. **CreatedById**: Reference to the user who created the document (type: `reference`).
19. **LastModifiedDate**: The date and time when the document was last modified (type: `datetime`).
20. **LastModifiedById**: Reference to the user who last modified the document (type: `reference`).
21. **SystemModstamp**: The date and time when the document was last modified by the system (type: `datetime`).
22. **IsBodySearchable**: Indicates whether the document body is searchable (type: `boolean`).
23. **LastViewedDate**: The date and time when the document was last viewed (type: `datetime`).
24. **LastReferencedDate**: The date and time when the document was last referenced (type: `datetime`).

These attributes provide comprehensive information about the document, including its metadata, content, and usage history.
label: Document
